programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Texans host the Broncos. Denver won a fifth straight game in Week 8 behind four TD passes from Bo Nix, and three scores from rookie RJ Harvey. DeMeco Ryans earned a win over his previous employer as Houston dumped San Francisco 26-15.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Jaguars return from their annual London pilgrimage to face the Raiders. Both clubs are back from their bye after losing in Week 7. Travis Hunter (JAX) piled up career highs of eight grabs and 101 yards, and scored his first TD in England.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Seahawks return from the bye to face the Commanders. Seattle emerged from its bye tied atop the NFC West after winning five of its past six games. Washington, minus Jayden Daniels, fell to Kansas City on Monday night for its third straight loss.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Texans host the Broncos. Denver won a fifth straight game in Week 8 behind four TD passes from Bo Nix, and three scores from rookie RJ Harvey. DeMeco Ryans earned a win over his previous employer as Houston dumped San Francisco 26-15.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Jaguars return from their annual London pilgrimage to face the Raiders. Both clubs are back from their bye after losing in Week 7. Travis Hunter (JAX) piled up career highs of eight grabs and 101 yards, and scored his first TD in England.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Seahawks return from the bye to face the Commanders. Seattle emerged from its bye tied atop the NFC West after winning five of its past six games. Washington, minus Jayden Daniels, fell to Kansas City on Monday night for its third straight loss.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A major security breach in the city's computer networks forces Firehouse 51's senior leaders to take matters into their own hands; Severide gears up for an arson investigation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Gallo clashes with the new lieutenant temporarily filling in for Casey; Severide closes in on a dangerous and deadly arsonist.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide and Herrmann clash over office space; Boden looks at Pelham's past as he considers making him permanent; Gallo's resentment of Pelham comes to a head; Brett and Ritter force Violet to confront her true feelings for Gallo.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Gallo, Violet and Ritter debut their microbrewery business at Winterfest; Brett prepares to present her paramedicine program to an oversight panel; Firehouse 51 gets in the holiday spirit.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Stella Kidd returns to Firehouse 51; the team must work together to put out a potassium fire in a tunnel; after that incident, Ritter begins to worry about a young cop who witnessed the fiery death of a truck driver.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: On a call with Station 37, a firefighter is struck by a power line and decides to lash out after her injury; Brett is visited by Scott and Amelia; Violet gets a surprise envelope; the rest of 51 enters a contest.

programme.desc: When a young woman is attacked in her apartment, evidence points to traumatic events from her buried past.
